name: Resurrection (James, Breach99, L_Drake)
description:
Welcome to Resurrection, Resurrection is a first-person shooter game based in the future where Medusa has been resurrected and you will have to take her down.

Backstory

In the far future, a weapon manufacturer was looking to create a new ultimate weapon. Around this time the remains of Medusa had been discovered and Medusa's heart was found to be still beating. This weapon manufacturer bought the remains of Medusa with the intent to create this ultimate weapon. The location where they were working on this weapon has gone dark.

You have been sent in to discover what has happened.   

Controls

Left Mouse Button = Fire Weapon

Right Mouse Button = Aim Weapon

W = Move Forwards

A = Move Left

S = Move Back

D = Move Right

Shift = Sprint

Space = Jump

X = Air Dash

E = Pick-Up/ Activate

R = Reload Weapon

T = Change Attachments

Escape = Pause Menu
